data.label: VirtualApp
data.description: VirtualApp(VA) 是一款运行于 Android 系统的沙盒产品，可以理解为轻量级的“Android 虚拟机”。其产品形态为高可扩展，可定制的集成 SDK，您可以基于 VA 或者使用 VA 定制开发各种看似不可能完成的项目。VA 目前被广泛应用于插件化开发、无感知热更新、云控自动化、多开、手游租号、手游手柄免激活、区块链、移动办公安全、军队政府保密、手机模拟信息、脚本自动化、自动化测试等技术领域。

data.label: VirtualApp
data.description: VirtualApp (VA) is a sandbox product running on the Android system, which can be understood as a lightweight 'Android virtual machine.' Its product form is a highly extensible, customizable integrated SDK, allowing you to develop various seemingly impossible projects based on VA or using VA customization. VA is currently widely used in fields such as plugin development, non-perceptive hot updates, cloud control automation, multi-open, game account leasing, game controller activation-free, blockchain, mobile office security, military and government confidentiality, mobile simulation information, script automation, and automated testing.
